column1: Smoque BBQ////The sliced brisket rivals any of the BBQ places that I've eaten at
column2: and I've spent time in both South Carolina and Kansas City.  The smoked chicken has great flavor as well
column3: and begs to be eaten without sauce to experience the full flavor of the pit.  The portion sizes are large
column4: as my wife and I usually get one sandwich and a platter so that we can split the sides. I enjoy the Memphis style BBQ sauce
column5: and don't care much for the Carolina style that they serve with their dishes
column6: but it ultimately comes down to personal preference there.
